remarks: Exercise: the integral of ` x |-> cos a x ` on an open interval. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
statement:

itgcoscmulx.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. RR ) $.

itgcoscmulx $p |- ( ph -> S. ( B (,) C ) ( cos ` ( A x. x ) ) _d x = ( ( ( sin ` ( A x. C ) ) - ( sin ` ( A x. B ) ) ) / A ) ) $.
$d A x $.
